extendedInfo.description: A FULL VERSION, AD-FREE, SEVEN-IN-ONE CALCULATOR FOR FREE OF COST FOR LIFETIME.You will be getting SCIENTIFIC CALCULATOR, UNIT CONVERTER, CURRENCY CONVERTER, BASIC CALCULATOR, TIP CALCULATOR ,BMI CALCULATOR and WORLD CLOCK in a single app.Palmcalc is a multipurpose application consisting of calculators, converters and world clock. It has been designed to simplify your idea about calculations. Itâs an open source application available free of cost for lifetime. It includes a landscape mode and an ad free interface which makes it easy to use. Palmcalc currently consists of 7 different types of tools and we plan to increase the number in future. It currently consists ofâ¢	Scientific Calculatorâ¢	Unit Converterâ¢	Currency Converterâ¢	Basic Calculatorâ¢	Tip Calculatorâ¢	World Clockâ¢	BMI CalculatorScientific Calculatorâ¢	Easier way to calculate different tedious math expressions containing trigonometric functions, power and root functions, log functions, modulus function, nPr, ncr.â¢	Angles can be specified in degrees or  radians .â¢	Hyperbolic option available.Unit Converterâ¢	Supports multi-unit conversionâ¢	Different conversion domains like temperature, length, weight, speed, volume, area , mass, time are availableâ¢	Conversion from one unit to another can be performed easily with the help of wheel pickerCurrency Converterâ¢	Helps to perform exchange rate calculationsâ¢	Set up your own personal currency listâ¢	Can convert to five different currencies simultaneouslyâ¢	Currencies of different countries are listed along with their flagsâ¢	Up to date exchange ratesBasic Calculatorâ¢	Helps you with the different basic day to day calculationsâ¢	Big buttonsâ¢	Useful for normal calculationsTip Calculatorâ¢	Calculate the tip and split the bill between any number of personsâ¢	Standard tip percentages of different countries are availableâ¢	Tip amount is calculated based on the tip percentage of the selected countryâ¢	Supports all international currenciesWorld Clockâ¢	Consists of analog and digital clock stylesâ¢	Allows you to add different time zonesâ¢	Helps you to keep track of time world wideâ¢	Customize the settings to suite your personal needsâ¢	Allows you to keep track of time in any city from any part of the worldBMI Calculatorâ¢	Body mass index calculationâ¢	English and Metric mode Are avaliableâ¢	Weight categorization Ex.Normal Weight,Under Weight, Obsse etcâ¢	Wheel picker for Easy SelectionKey Words:- calculator, scientific calculator,advanced calculator, ad-free calculator,simple calculator,unit converter,currency converter,tip calculator,universal calculator,world clock,free calculator, simple calculator,real life calculator, universal conversion,tip and split calculator,calculator for students,body mass index,bmi calculator,health calculator.
